name: Keep It Up (XealGames)
description:
Keep It Up

Keep the bomb in the air by shooting it with the cannon. Hitting the bomb will increase your score. Can you beat the developer high score of 59?

How to play: Aim with your mouse and shoot with left click. Holding left click will shoot immediately after your cooldown is over. 

The game works (mostly) on phones and tablets as well. Tap where you want to shoot or hold down your finger to keep shooting.
